activities: RehabTool.com is an information technology company that develops and markets innovative hardware, software, solutions and services to assist individuals with disabilities and special needs. Any personal information that is communicated voluntarily to us is treated strictly as confidential and is only used for communication purposes regarding our products and services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms:
P3P Member. We comply with the Platform for Privacy Preferences (P3P), a privacy rating standard of the World Wide Web Consortium designed to inform web users of a site's privacy policy(www.w3.org/P3P).
CNIL Member. We registered our privacy policy to the Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés (www.cnil.org).
HON Member. We comply with the HON Code of Conduct (Health on the Net Foundation) and ensure the confidentiality of any personal information provided to us (www.hon.ch).
recoursemech: We are committed to cooperating with Data Protection Authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
